channel.title: My Homeboy Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
channel.description: My Homeboy Podcast is a black culture discussion show that recreates the feeling cooling in the barbershop with your homies. For a dope podcast experience with a bit of nostalgia, inside jokes, black anecdotes, guest, and a few profound moments of reflection, tune in to MyHomeboyPodcast
channel.itunes:summary: My Homeboy Podcast is a black culture discussion show that recreates the feeling cooling in the barbershop with your homies. For a dope podcast experience with a bit of nostalgia, inside jokes, black anecdotes, guest, and a few profound moments of reflection, tune in to MyHomeboyPodcast
channel.itunes:author: My Homeboy Podcast

item.title: More than a Village
item.itunes:title: More than a Village
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
Hey you... yeah you.... Thanks for listening to our podcast. Treat yourself today, you deserve it.

Listen in as the homies Eric, Twon, and Napoleon speak with our guest Leslie and Darius about their non-profit "More than a village". 
Have you ever had a convo with someone in a HBCU band? Listen to this pod and act like you have.
item.itunes:summary:

Have you ever had a convo with someone in a HBCU band? Listen to this pod and act like you have.

item.title: Culture
item.itunes:title: Culture
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
Tune in as the guys chop it up with Matt and Z of Culture, a sneakerheads dream consignment shop. We talking shoes, entrepreneurship, and of course big CULTURE on this episode.

Y'all let us know your favorite sneakers in our ig comments!

item.title: What day is it?
item.itunes:title: What day is it?
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
Happy Holidays!
But with people celebrating Christmas in October, time off from work and Thanksgiving DRESSING on our mind we can't seem to figure out what day it is.

Join the homies Eric, Drew, and Napoleon as we discuss "holiday cheer", Kevin Samuels, and the post-pre covid dating scene (y'all heard about Omnicron)
item.itunes:summary:
Happy Holidays!
But with people celebrating Christmas in October, time off from work and Thanksgiving DRESSING on our mind we can't seem to figure out what day it is.

Join the homies Eric, Drew, and Napoleon as we discuss "holiday cheer", Kevin Samuels, and the post-pre covid dating scene (y'all heard about Omnicron)

item.title: Shitty Mandates and Social Media
item.itunes:title: Shitty Mandates and Social Media
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
Peoples!!!

Listen in as Twon, Eric, and Napoleon speak on cleanliness, the vaccine mandate, and how social media platforms incorporate black stories.

Speaking of social media... join in on the convo on Facebook and leave us a 5 star review on you podcast player. We appreciate it.

item.title: Milk Crate Madness
item.itunes:title: Milk Crate Madness
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
What up peeps!

We trying something a little different with a shorter episode this time. Let us know if you dig the new format in our Facebook comments

This time Eric, Twon, and Napoleon back talking about milk crate madness, the Shacarri Richardson foot race, and our cis gendered heterosexual male opinion on the term "Alpha Male". 

Let us know your "hot takes"  in our Facebook page.
If you agree with us, let us know. If you disagree with us, let us know why

item.title: Summer Summer Summer Jo
item.itunes:title: Summer Summer Summer Jo
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
Hey Homies! Listen in as Napoleon, Twon, and Eric speak with ATL's own Summer Jo. With eye of Ansil Adams, the knife of Wolfgang Puck, and the heart of Mother Theresa, Summer had a chat with us about her upbringing, her non-profit "Everybody Eats", and her cooking spices. Stay tuned to the end of the pod to hear us dive into dating and relationships

Make sure you favorite our pod wherever you listen to podcast and if you laugh send the clip to a homie!
item.itunes:summary:

Stay tuned to the end of the pod to hear us dive into dating and relationships

Make sure you favorite our pod wherever you listen to podcast and if you laugh send the clip to a homie!

item.title: Kanye and Double Consciousness
item.itunes:title: Kanye and Double Consciousness
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
In this episode the homies (Eric, Jason, Drew Twon and Napoleon) talk about the Kanye Experience and WEB Dubois concept of double consciousness.

Originally, double consciousness was specifically the psychological challenge African Americans experienced of "always looking at one's self through the eyes" of a racist white society and "measuring oneself by the means of a nation that looked back in contempt".[1] The term also referred to Du Bois's experiences of reconciling his African heritage with an upbringing in a European-dominated society.
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode the homies (Eric, Jason, Drew Twon and Napoleon) talk about the Kanye Experience and WEB Dubois concept of double consciousness.

Originally, double consciousness was specifically the psychological challenge African Americans experienced of "always looking at one's self through the eyes" of a racist white society and "measuring oneself by the means of a nation that looked back in contempt".[1] The term also referred to Du Bois's experiences of reconciling his African heritage with an upbringing in a European-dominated society.

item.title: Man up
item.itunes:title: Man up
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
We get deep this time yall.

Join Twon, Eric, Drew and Napoleon as we discuss what it is to "Man up" in abusive situations and attempt to answer the question "How conservative can a black person be until they are considered a coon"
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Ian aka Rustyforthewin
item.itunes:title: Ian aka Rustyforthewin
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
What up peeps!

Join Twon, Eric and Napoleon and our guest Ian aka Rustyforthewin on IG as we chop it up about:

Bow wow and Soulja Boy versus 
Critical Race Theory
Gervonta Davis Fight
Playoff Basketball
Derrick Chauvin sentencing 
and some other topics.

This a longer episode so rock with us. Also leave us a 5 star review on your favorite streaming service. Matter fact leave a few!

Also Make sure to check out Rustyforthewin and the "2 piece and a biscuit podcast"

item.title: Pastel playas in alligators
item.itunes:title: Pastel playas in alligators
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
What up famo! In this episode we talking about some of our favorite DMX moments, George Floyd's killers court case, lil nas x new video, and the greatest cookout/easter/block party versus ever conceived.. Earth, Wind and Fire vs The Isley Brothers. This an episode you don't wanna miss.

Also, we want send a special shout out to our homies at Castro for putting us on their discovery page! If you really bout it you'll leave a 5 star review on the app. Preciate ya and happy listening

item.title: Support Black Colleges
item.itunes:title: Support Black Colleges
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
In this episode the homies Eric, Twon, and Napoleon sit and chat with Justin, 1/2 of Support Black Colleges. Listen in as we discuss Coming 2 America, NBA All-star weekend in Atlanta, and Clubhouse. Stick around to learn about his journey at his HBCU alma mater, how Support Black Colleges was formed, and Justin's new entrepreneur ebook 7 Figure Fast Track. 

Digging the podcast? Show love by leaving a 5 star review with your favorite podcast moment. Thanks!
item.itunes:summary:

item.description:
HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!


Join the homies Eric, Twon, Drew, Napoleon, and our guest MT as we talk about the "Al-Kracker Insurrection on Capitol Hill"


More importantly than the impending doom of "Merica", we are talking to our homie MT about his new product. Metric Mate is a health and fitness app that is about to take the industry by storm (see what I did there)

item.title: A Very Tasteful Gathering
item.itunes:title: A Very Tasteful Gathering
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
Listen in as we talk to our guest Maegan of Tasteful Gatherings. We discuss the how she came up with the idea for Tasteful Gatherings, get to know some of her favorite cocktails, and sip on glitter cause we fancy.

We also discuss:

Gucci v Jeezy versus battle

Women being the breadwinner in a relationship
item.itunes:summary:
Listen in as we talk to our guest Maegan of Tasteful Gatherings. We discuss the how she came up with the idea for Tasteful Gatherings, get to know some of her favorite cocktails, and sip on glitter cause we fancy.

We also discuss:

Gucci v Jeezy versus battle

Women being the breadwinner in a relationship

item.title: Monumental Roast
item.itunes:title: Monumental Roast
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
TwonLack, Big_Grahams, prettyflyforafatguy, and N_dynamite_ are back discussion the social unrest and changes sweeping America and more specifically Atlanta. Visit our IG @MyHomboyPodcast to listen to our conversation with @KingWillams about the removal of confederate monuments. Topics included confederate monuments, Starbucks, Atlanta protest, agents setting Wendys on fire, Dave Chappelle, and the tangents you love. Happy Juneteenth!!!

RIP Breona Taylor

RIP Rayshard Brooks

RIP William Green

item.itunes:author: My Homeboy Podcast

item.title: A toast to Kobe "Bean" Bryant
item.itunes:title: A toast to Kobe "Bean" Bryant
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
RIP Kobe Bryant and his daughter Gianna Bryant.  There is a short moment of silence in the beginning to honor their memory. Legends Live Forever. This episode was planned to be fun and light hearted, however, we were informed the unfortunate news of Kobe Bryant passing right before our recording. We have to thank Ale Sharpton for kicking it with us on this suddenly somber occasion and some good people at The Beverly for informing us.

Some of Ale's current media outlets include Thrillist.com, Southern Craft Beer Magazine, Craft Beer Magazine, Upscale, and Ebony to name a few. The Kobe Bryant news was developing during this episodes recording, so please excuse any misinformation. This is the perfect episode for non-beer drinkers who are destined to become converted.

We discuss Kobes legacy, Ales collaboration with New Belgium and creation of his Piano Keys Imperial Stout, beer festivals, the little-known origins of beer, and more. 

Tell us what your favorite beer is on Facebook and enjoy!
item.itunes:summary:
RIP Kobe Bryant and his daughter Gianna Bryant.  There is a short moment of silence in the beginning to honor their memory. Legends Live Forever. This episode was planned to be fun and light hearted, however, we were informed the unfortunate news of Kobe Bryant passing right before our recording. We have to thank Ale Sharpton for kicking it with us on this suddenly somber occasion and some good people at The Beverly for informing us.

Some of Ale's current media outlets include Thrillist.com, Southern Craft Beer Magazine, Craft Beer Magazine, Upscale, and Ebony to name a few. The Kobe Bryant news was developing during this episodes recording, so please excuse any misinformation. This is the perfect episode for non-beer drinkers who are destined to become converted.

We discuss Kobes legacy, Ales collaboration with New Belgium and creation of his Piano Keys Imperial Stout, beer festivals, the little-known origins of beer, and more. 

Tell us what your favorite beer is on Facebook and enjoy!

item.title: Bonus Thanksgiving Episode
item.itunes:title: Bonus Thanksgiving Episode
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
You can't have a proper Thanksgiving without a Massacre story! Don't worry positivities are scattered throughout. More of a rapid fire Q&A with King sharing a ton of knowledge and why Midtown isn't a thing.

King Williams (IamKingWilliams) a Filmmaker, columnist, writer, and historian is still dropping jewelry about Atlanta history. His work can be found here: https://saportareport.com/?s=king+Williams .

Seriously, shot out to our guest, King Williams (IamKingWilliams) a Filmmaker, columnist, and writer. His work can be found here: https://saportareport.com/?s=king+Williams  . A very entertaining and enlightening conversation.

Topics:

Colin Kapernick tryouts in Atlanta

Disney and Disney+

Myles Garrett

Atlanta Gentrification, development, history, real estate, and soil

item.title: Movies and Spoilers pt.2
item.itunes:title: Movies and Spoilers pt.2
item.itunes:subtitle: A Podcast from your favorite homeboy
item.description:
SPOILERS! SPOILERS! SPOILERS!

In this episode Napoleon and @Twonlack are joined by Raecine Tyes founder of the Black Film Festival Atlanta (https://www.blackfilmfestivalatlanta.com/t) and Director Edward Varnie (https://www.imdb.com/name/nm5212162/) AKA Knowledge.


Part 2 episode for all our cinephile homies. We discuss:

The Joker Movie (SPOILER)

The Black Film Festival Atlanta

Edward's newest digital release, Release

Death of a Wizard, Edwards Short

My name is Dolemite

some of our "favorite films" and our usual tangents.

item.description:
This week we back at it with the same crew


Is Dave Chappelle's new "Sticks and Stones" insensitive?

Is Antonio Brown a dummy or a genius?

Other topics include Atlanta's 255 tapas fire, Gambling, and Bro Code.


CLICK, LIKE, SUBSCRIBE, COMMENT!
